siddhartha gauthama libartiye pennanawa kiyala kawuda kiyanawa ahuna.ethakotama mata kalpanawata aawe wenadata chiththara patiyak patan ganna kalin libartiya issaraha inna noyekuth widiyata anda palanda gaththa tharuna tharuniyo polima.samahara dawasa walata randu wenawath ahenawa kattiya kalin buk karala passe aapu unta chans eka nathi wela.mole koloppan wage neda?mama me mokatada enna hadanne kiyala?.mekayi siddhiya godak kattiya ahala athi kathawa lankawe sinamahalaka boks walin wadima illumak thiyenne libarti sinama hale boks walata kiyala kiyana eka.ee kathawa paththakin thiyamu dan.

lankawe usama sthanaya...saha akuge apara gathraya karannata deyak nomathi wu kala api nawatha kanden basinnata thiranaya kalemu.wan rathayenma nuwara eliya nagarayata pamini api karannata wena deyak nomathi nisath, thibunath eeta mudal nomathi nisath kelinma kolambaa bala yana basayakata goda wimu.athara magadi basaye wangu ganima nisama api hathara denatama hadunu okkara gathiyath, eyata prathikarayak lesa sundara aushadhawediniyak siti famasiyakin gath promethasin biwu bawath, ee aushadhaye athi nidrajanakabhawayata pin siduwannata gampahata enathuru siduwu kisiwak mata mathaka nathi bawath harennata wisheshayen kiyannata aththe basayata goda wimata prathama rawith milata gath keti kama parsalaya ya.eya anathurakata pathwu nawakin jiwitharakshaka bottuwakata patawa ganna kama sanchithayakatath wada wadi bawa kiwa yuthuya.eyita amatharawa okkara gathiyata prathikarmayak lesa api promethasin gath namuth rawithta eya madi wu athara asala kadayakin sudulunu murukku bagayak miladi gath ohu galanalaya osse aahara ihalata eema walakina se ihala sita pahalata murukku obannata wiya.
